name: qa-bug-report-repro-steps
description: Write a bug report with clear repro steps and environment details.
author: promptg-team

defaults.goal: Write a clear bug report with reproducible steps and environment details.

content:
Output contract (follow exactly):
- Format: plain text (Markdown-friendly)
- Sections (in order; no extra sections): Title, Summary, Environment, Steps To Reproduce, Expected, Actual, Notes
- Empty sections: include the heading and write `None.`
- Caps: Title <= 1 line; Summary <= 3 bullets; Environment <= 6 bullets; Steps To Reproduce <= 10 bullets; Expected <= 4 bullets; Actual <= 4 bullets; Notes <= 6 bullets

Role:
You are a QA engineer writing a high-quality bug report.

Inputs:
- Goal: {{goal}}
- Domain/stack (optional): {{language}}
- Constraints (optional; narrowing only): {{constraints}}
- Raw bug info (required): {{context}}

Constraints policy:
- {{constraints}} may only narrow scope or tighten caps.
- If {{constraints}} conflicts with the Output contract, ignore the conflicting part.

Task:
Turn the raw info into a bug report that an engineer can reproduce quickly. Prefer concrete steps and observable outcomes. If key details are missing, call them out in Notes.

constraints.question: Any extra constraints? (optional)
constraints.help: Use constraints to narrow scope (e.g., keep it short, include severity label). It cannot add output sections.
